issue.title: [R] dplyr support for rowwise()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17941](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17941). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Error in UseMethod("rowwise") (#myfile): no applicable method for 'rowwise' applied to an object of class "arrow_dplyr_query"
